name: s3len
params: class c0, class c1, class c2

stmt.origin: cats1len(cs3(c0, c1, c2), nat3, cs2(c0, c1), c2, nat2)
stmt.pretty: cats1len(<" c0 . c1 . c2 ">, nat3, <" c0 . c1 ">, c2, nat2)

body.origin:
|- wceq(cfv(chash, cs3(c0, c1, c2)), nat3)
-| wceq(cs3(c0, c1, c2), co(cs2(c0, c1), cconcat, cs1(c2)))
-| wcel(cs2(c0, c1), cword(universe))
-| wceq(cfv(chash, cs2(c0, c1)), nat2)
-| wceq(co(nat2, caddc, nat1), nat3)

cumulated.origin:
|- wceq(cfv(chash, cs3(c0, c1, c2)), nat3)
-| wceq(cs3(c0, c1, c2), co(cs2(c0, c1), cconcat, cs1(c2)))
-| wcel(cs2(c0, c1), cword(universe))
-| wceq(cfv(chash, cs2(c0, c1)), nat2)
-| wceq(co(nat2, caddc, nat1), nat3)

-| wceq(co(nat2, caddc, nat1), nat3)

-| wceq(cfv(chash, cs2(c0, c1)), nat2)
-| wceq(co(nat2, caddc, nat1), nat3)
